title: Coffee And Cups: 2 Stories Of High Stakes And High Prices
teaser: Paying $15 for a cup of coffee may sound alarming. Ozy.com co-founder Carlos Watson tells NPR's Arun Rath why some think it can be worth it. They also discuss a rising star on Portugal's soccer team.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
